DOC.brief_summary: To test safety efficacy new generation botulinum toxin preparation A2NTX treat stroke patient low limb spasticity . - study degree spasticity ankle knee joint , walk speed 30 patient stroke inject 300 unit BOTOX A2NTX blind manner patient , physician , examiner . - also assess safety A2NTX compare BOTOX .
